page.title: 19Data Collection in PAUNTLEY
page.content:
An eight page questionnaire was delivered to every house (126) in the block. Eight houses were unoccupied. { {102}questionnaires were returned.
Questions asked concerned, Buildings, Heating, Family Structure, Hobbies and Interests, Entertainment, Shopping, Food and Cooking, Transport, Recreation, Employment, Computers, Electronic Equipment, Farm Machinery.
Residents were asked to state their own views about the area.
Questionnaires, statistical analysis sheets, histograms of data and pupils' essays are presently kept at Huntingdon, Cradley, Nr. Malvern. Hopefully they will ultimately be placed in the County Archives.
